content.rendered:
Following his graduation with an Honours degree in Civil Engineering from the Universiti Teknologi PETRONAS, Malaysia, Afifi commenced his professional career in the onshore civil construction sector and port construction before crossing over into the Oil and Gas construction industry. With over 6 years in the industry, both in onshore and offshore roles, Afifi now leverages his experience and technical understanding by specialising in both offshore CAR and Operational claims, as well as shipyard BAR losses

Discipline: Civil Engineer BSc.
Specialism: EPCIC Projects; Subsea Engineering; Pipelines, Expert Evidence, Arbitration & Litigation Support.

Contact

Singapore | +65 9656 0640
